task.title: Fix docker compose build contexts for shared modules
task.author: user

steps.summary: Reported docker compose build failure resolving shared modules (missing /shared/auth/go.mod).

Reviewed app Dockerfiles and compose build contexts to confirm shared modules were outside build context. Evidence: apps/todo-list/Dockerfile, apps/projects/Dockerfile, deploy/docker-compose.yml, apps/*/go.mod.
Switched compose build contexts to repo root and updated Dockerfiles to copy shared modules plus app sources so replace directives resolve during go mod download.

final_summary: Updated compose build contexts to the repo root and adjusted app Dockerfiles to copy shared modules and app sources so local docker compose builds can resolve shared module replace paths.
